feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 11:37 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: N 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening then changing to light snow overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
